name: Watch Your Step (ambiguous-name, WendyTT)
description:
Watch Your Step

This is a game I worked on, along with Wendi Tan, for a game design class. It's a short experimental puzzle game about placing traps 

I did most of the coding, and Wendi did most of the art and writing. Appropriate art credits are on the title screen, but if you want to see them in text form, here they are:

- William.Thompsonj, https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-plant-repack 

- yolkati, https://opengameart.org/content/isometric-snakes

We're very sorry there isn't any sound, we didn't have during the project to add sounds. If it helps, you can imagine sound effects in your head.
